meanings.definition: A small North American shrub with glossy leaves and white flowers, producing red berries.
meanings.sent1: The wintergreen shrub grows in the forest.
meanings.sent2: I picked some wintergreen berries for a nature project.
meanings.sent3: The wintergreen plant decided to wear a berry as a hat.
meanings.sent4: The forest floor was a carpet of wintergreen berries.
meanings.sent5: The red wintergreen berries looked like little jewels in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A sweet, minty flavor or scent derived from the wintergreen plant.
meanings.sent1: I love the taste of wintergreen in my gum.
meanings.sent2: The wintergreen flavor made the drink refreshing.
meanings.sent3: The wintergreen scent danced around the room like a happy ghost.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as fresh and sweet as wintergreen.
meanings.sent5: The wintergreen candy left a cool sensation on my tongue.

meanings.definition: A bright green color resembling that of wintergreen leaves.
meanings.sent1: The walls were painted in a vibrant wintergreen hue.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a lovely shade of wintergreen.
meanings.sent3: The wintergreen color of the car made it stand out in the parking lot.
meanings.sent4: The grass in the park was a lush wintergreen carpet.
meanings.sent5: The wintergreen paint on the door made the house look cheerful.
